pages.text: Increases the range of cast spells by 12%. Affects:$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_resonance)Path of Resonance$(/l)$(li)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_the_sojourn)Path of the Sojourn$()

pages.mod_text: Your scepters reach increases. Imbue onto any scepter with the recipe on the next page.
